displayName.japanese: ビジュアルノベル王者！

description.brazilian: Conviver com Lilith não é difícil o suficiente para precisar trapacear, né?!
description.english: Really? Needing Cheats for Lilith's Route?
description.indonesian: Tidak sulit bergaul dengan Lilith sampai perlu curang, kan?!
description.japanese: リリスと付き合うのそんなに難しい？チートする必要はないと思うけど。
description.russian: Неужели с Лилит не так сложно, чтобы нужно было жульничать?!
description.schinese: 和莉莉丝相处也没有困难到需要作弊吧！？
description.tchinese: 和莉莉絲相處也沒有困難到需要作弊吧！？
description.token: Really? Needing Cheats for Lilith's Route?

description.brazilian: Claro, vamos escolher a opção negativa...
description.english: Of course, let's pick the negative choice
description.indonesian: Tentu, mari pilih pilihan negatif...
description.japanese: もちろん、選択拒否を選ぼう……
description.schinese: 当然，让我们选择否定选择吧……
description.tchinese: 當然，讓我們選擇否定選擇吧……
description.token: Of course, let's pick the negative choice

description.brazilian: Definições do passado e do futuro.
description.english: Definitions from Past and Future
description.indonesian: Definisi dari masa lalu dan masa depan.
description.japanese: 過去と未来からの定義。
description.schinese: 来自过去与未来的定义。
description.tchinese: 來自過去與未來的定義。
description.token: Definitions from Past and Future

displayName.brazilian: Abrir as portas para um novo mundo
displayName.english: Opening the Gates to a New World
displayName.token: Opening the Gates to a New World

description.brazilian: Tudo é uma escolha de 'FONTAINEBLEAU;OVEN'.
description.english: Indeed, everything is 'FONTAINEBLEAU;OVEN's' choice!
description.indonesian: Semua adalah pilihan 'FONTAINEBLEAU;OVEN'.
description.japanese: すべては「FONTAINEBLEAU;OVEN」が決めたこと。
description.schinese: 一切都是「FONTAINEBLEAU;OVEN」的选择。
description.tchinese: 一切都是「FONTAINEBLEAU;OVEN」的選擇。
description.token: Indeed, everything is 'FONTAINEBLEAU;OVEN's' choice!

displayName.brazilian: Dominar o plano da deusa do futuro

description.brazilian: Impedir a conspiração de FONTAINEBLEAU.
description.english: Stop FONTAINEBLEAU's Schemes!
description.indonesian: Cegah konspirasi FONTAINEBLEAU.
description.japanese: FONTAINEBLEAUの陰謀を阻止する。
description.schinese: 阻止FONTAINEBLEAU的阴谋。
description.tchinese: 阻止FONTAINEBLEAU的阴谋。

description.brazilian: Limites da percepção.
description.english: The Boundaries of Perception
description.indonesian: Batas persepsi.
description.japanese: 感覚の境界線。
description.schinese: 感知的边界。
description.tchinese: 感知的邊界。
description.token: The Boundaries of Perception

displayName.japanese: あなたのゲーム、彼女の世界

description.brazilian: Não é só 'você' que precisa configurar a interface.
description.english: The second "player"
description.indonesian: Tidak hanya 'kamu' yang perlu mengatur antarmuka.
description.japanese: 2人目の「プレイヤー」。
description.russian: Не только «ты» нуждаешься в настройке интерфейса.
description.schinese: 不只有「你」需要设置界面。
description.tchinese: 不只有「你」需要設置介面。
description.token: The second "player"

description.brazilian: Prato personalizado, design e serviço.
description.english: Customize your perfect dining experience with: • Artfully crafted plates • Stunning presentations • Personalized service
description.indonesian: Piring kustom, desain, dan pelayanan.
description.japanese: オーダーメイドの食器、盛りつけとサービス。
description.schinese: 定制餐盘、造型和服务。
description.tchinese: 定制餐盤、造型和服務。
description.token: Customize your perfect dining experience with: • Artfully crafted plates • Stunning presentations • Personalized service

description.brazilian: Quem comeu o bolo?
description.english: Who Ate the Cake?
description.indonesian: Siapa yang makan kue?
description.japanese: ケーキを食べたのは誰？
description.schinese: 是谁吃了蛋糕？
description.tchinese: 是誰吃了蛋糕？
description.token: Who Ate the Cake?

description.brazilian: Somos todos existências semelhantes.
description.english: We Are Kindred Existences
description.indonesian: Kita semua adalah makhluk yang serupa.
description.japanese: 私たちは似た者同士ね。
description.russian: Мы все схожи в своём существовании.
description.schinese: 我们都是类似的存在呢。
description.tchinese: 我們都是類似的存在呢。
description.token: We Are Kindred Existences

description.brazilian: Objetos desbloqueados: O Livro dos Sonhadores.
description.english: New Romance Route Unlocked: The Codex of Morphean
description.indonesian: Karakter yang dapat dikejar telah dibuka: Buku Pengejar Impian.
description.japanese: 攻略可能対象「夢追いの法典」がアンロックされました。
description.schinese: 可攻略对象已解锁：逐梦之典。
description.tchinese: 可攻略對象已解鎖：逐夢之典。
description.token: New Romance Route Unlocked: The Codex of Morphean

description.brazilian: Dedicado aos valentes Sonhadores, em nome da Floresta Prateada.
description.english: To the Fearless Morphean Paradox, in Honor of the Silvery Forest!
description.indonesian: Didedikasikan untuk para pengejar impian yang berani, atas nama Hutan Perak.
description.japanese: 銀葱の森の名において、勇敢な夢追い人に捧げる。
description.russian: В память о смелых мечтателях, от имени Леса Серебряных Луков.
description.schinese: 谨以银葱之森之名，敬献给英勇无畏的逐梦者。
description.tchinese: 謹以銀蔥之森之名，敬獻給英勇無畏的逐夢者。
description.token: To the Fearless Morphean Paradox, in Honor of the Silvery Forest!

description.brazilian: Fim temporário da jornada pela Floresta Prateada
description.english: Time to bid farewell to the Silvery Forest
description.indonesian: Sementara perjalanan di Hutan Perak berakhir sementara
description.japanese: 銀葱の森での旅は一旦終了。
description.russian: Временно завершённый путь в Лес Серебряных Луков
description.schinese: 暂时结束银葱之森的旅途
description.tchinese: 暫時結束銀蔥之森的旅途
description.token: Time to bid farewell to the Silvery Forest

description.brazilian: Desde os tempos antigos, cada Sonhador tem uma compreensão diferente de sua missão.
description.english: Each bearer of the Morphean path finds their own meaning in the journey
description.indonesian: Sejak dahulu, setiap pengejar impian memiliki pemahaman yang berbeda tentang misinya.
description.japanese: 古来より、すべての夢追い人はそれぞれの使命に対し独自の理解を持っている。
description.russian: С давних пор каждый мечтатель воспринимает свою миссию по-разному.
description.schinese: 自古以来，每位逐梦者都对自己的使命有不同的理解。
description.tchinese: 自古以來，每位逐夢者都對自己的使命有不同的理解。
description.token: Each bearer of the Morphean path finds their own meaning in the journey

description.brazilian: Primeiro passo, depois o segundo...
description.english: First step, then the second...
description.indonesian: Langkah pertama, kemudian langkah kedua...
description.japanese: 一歩目、そして二歩目……
description.schinese: 第一步，然后是第二步……
description.tchinese: 第一步，然後是第二步……
description.token: First step, then the second...

description.brazilian: Essa é uma armadilha doce e quase imperceptível.
description.english: A Sweet Trap, So Subtle Yet Divine!
description.indonesian: Ini adalah jebakan manis yang hampir tidak terlihat.
description.japanese: これはとても気づかれにくい、甘いトラップなの。
description.schinese: 这是一个难以察觉的，甜蜜的陷阱。
description.tchinese: 這是一個難以察覺的，甜蜜的陷阱。
description.token: A Sweet Trap, So Subtle Yet Divine!

description.brazilian: Fazer uma comunicação agradável sob a armadilha doce.
description.english: A delightful conversation beneath a honeyed trap!
description.indonesian: Melakukan komunikasi yang menyenangkan di bawah jebakan manis.
description.japanese: 楽しい会話だったね。
description.russian: Провести приятную беседу в сладкой ловушке.
description.schinese: 在甜蜜的陷阱之下，进行一次愉快的沟通。
description.tchinese: 在甜蜜的陷阱之下，進行一次愉快的溝通。
description.token: A delightful conversation beneath a honeyed trap!

description.brazilian: Se você conseguir terminar essa frase, vai perceber que na verdade isso é um 'truque de mágica', do melhor mágico do mundo.
description.english: Ta-da! You've just witnessed a marvelous trick from the world's greatest magician! By reading these very words, you've become part of the magic itself~
description.indonesian: Jika kamu bisa menyelesaikan kalimat ini, kamu akan menemukan bahwa ini sebenarnya 'trik sulap' dari penyihir terbaik di dunia.
description.japanese: この文を最期まで読めば、文自体が「手品」であることに気づくはずよ。世界一の魔法使いより。
description.russian: Если вы смогли дочитать это сообщение, вы поймете, что это на самом деле «магический трюк», от самого лучшего волшебника в мире.
description.schinese: 如果你能把这句话读完，你就会发现，这实际是一个「魔术把戏」，来自世界上最棒的魔法使。
description.tchinese: 如果你能把這句話讀完，你就會發現，這實際是一個「魔術把戲」，來自世界上最棒的魔法使。
description.token: Ta-da! You've just witnessed a marvelous trick from the world's greatest magician! By reading these very words, you've become part of the magic itself~

description.brazilian: Estrelas, músicas, parque de diversões.
description.english: • Twinkling stars above • Musical notes dancing in the air • Colorful lights of the carnival • Laughter echoing through the night
description.indonesian: Langit berbintang, lagu-lagu, taman hiburan.
description.japanese: 星空、歌声、遊園地。
description.schinese: 星空，歌声，游乐园。
description.tchinese: 星空，歌聲，遊樂園。
description.token: • Twinkling stars above • Musical notes dancing in the air • Colorful lights of the carnival • Laughter echoing through the night

displayName.japanese: スイートナースの治療

description.brazilian: Perambular entre milhares de pensamentos.
description.english: Drifting through a thousand thoughts...
description.indonesian: Mengembara di antara ribuan pikiran.
description.japanese: 思考の海を旅する。
description.schinese: 在万千思绪中漫游。
description.tchinese: 在萬千思緒中漫遊。
description.token: Drifting through a thousand thoughts...

displayName.english: The existence of you and me
displayName.token: The existence of you and me

description.brazilian: Como um delicioso bolinho de morango~
description.english: You're Just Like a Delightful Strawberry Cupcake!
description.indonesian: Seperti kue kecil stroberi yang lezat~
description.japanese: 甘いイチゴケーキみたい！
description.schinese: 就像是一个美味的草莓小蛋糕~
description.tchinese: 就像是一個美味的草莓小蛋糕~
description.token: You're Just Like a Delightful Strawberry Cupcake!

displayName.brazilian: Você que não existe, e eu
displayName.english: The nonexistence of you AND me
displayName.indonesian: Kamu yang tidak ada, dan aku
displayName.japanese: ここにいないあなたと私
displayName.token: The nonexistence of you AND me

description.brazilian: Você não existe, você não existe, você não existe!
description.english: YOU DON'T EXIST YOU DON'T EXIST YOU DON'T EXIST YOU'RE NOT REAL!!!!
description.indonesian: Kamu tidak ada, kamu tidak ada, kamu tidak ada!
description.japanese: あなたは存在しないあなたは存在しないあなたは存在しないあなたは存在しない！
description.russian: Ты не существуешь, ты не существуешь, ты не существуешь!
description.schinese: 你不存在你不存在你不存在你不存在你不存在你不存在你不存在！
description.tchinese: 你不存在你不存在你不存在你不存在你不存在你不存在你不存在！
description.token: YOU DON'T EXIST YOU DON'T EXIST YOU DON'T EXIST YOU'RE NOT REAL!!!!

displayName.english: The existence of you AND me
displayName.japanese: ここにいるあなたと私
displayName.token: The existence of you AND me

description.brazilian: Posso te abraçar de novo, para sempre...
description.english: Hold Me Forever, Won't You...?
description.indonesian: Bolehkah aku memelukmu lagi, selamanya...
description.japanese: もう少しだけ抱きしめててもいい？世界の終わりまで……
description.russian: Могу ли я обнять тебя снова, навсегда...
description.schinese: 可以让我再抱一会儿吗，直到永远……
description.tchinese: 可以讓我再抱一會兒嗎，直到永遠……
description.token: Hold Me Forever, Won't You...?

description.brazilian: Eu te encontrei, agora...
description.english: Found you at last... and now...
description.indonesian: Aku sudah menemukannya, dan selanjutnya...
description.japanese: あなたを見つけた、これからは……
description.schinese: 我已经找到你了，接下来……
description.tchinese: 我已經找到你了，接下來……
description.token: Found you at last... and now...

description.brazilian: Morte instantânea.
description.english: A moment of death
description.indonesian: Kematian sekejap.
description.japanese: 瞬殺。
description.schinese: 一瞬死亡。
description.tchinese: 一瞬死亡。
description.token: A moment of death

description.brazilian: Sua postura corajosa será eternamente lembrada.
description.english: Your heroic figure shall be eternally remembered.
description.indonesian: Gerakan berani kamu akan dikenang selamanya.
description.japanese: その雄姿は永遠に記憶されるだろう。
description.russian: Твоя смелая поза будет помнить навсегда.
description.schinese: 你英勇的身姿将被永远铭记。
description.tchinese: 你英勇的身姿將被永遠銘記。
description.token: Your heroic figure shall be eternally remembered.

displayName.japanese: 今にも倒れそうな舞台

description.brazilian: Tudo isso não é imutável.
description.english: The Wheels of Destiny Turn At Our Command!
description.indonesian: Semua ini tidak tak bisa diubah.
description.japanese: すべてが決まったわけではない。
description.schinese: 这一切并非不可改变。
description.tchinese: 這一切並非不可改變。
description.token: The Wheels of Destiny Turn At Our Command!

description.brazilian: Eu sempre estive aqui.
description.english: I've Been Here All Along...
description.indonesian: Aku selalu ada di sini.
description.japanese: 私はずっとここにいる。
description.schinese: 我一直都在。
description.tchinese: 我一直都在。
description.token: I've Been Here All Along...

description.brazilian: Sair suavemente, ou abrir a primeira página novamente...
description.english: Exit Game or Start Anew?
description.indonesian: Pergi perlahan, atau buka halaman pertama lagi...
description.japanese: ひそかに離れるか、それとも新しい一ページをめくるか……
description.russian: Тихо уйти или открыть первую страницу...
description.schinese: 轻轻地离开，或是重新翻开第一页……
description.tchinese: 輕輕地離開，或是重新翻開第一頁……
description.token: Exit Game or Start Anew?

description.brazilian: Outra escolha.
description.english: Another Choice Awaits...
description.indonesian: Pilihan lain.
description.japanese: 新しい選択。
description.schinese: 另一次选择。
description.tchinese: 另一次選擇。
description.token: Another Choice Awaits...
